content: crochet this beautifully textured cardigan using the popular waffle stitch the watson waffle crochet cardigan is a chunky sweater that looks so cozy with its long length bulky feel and large pockets this cardigan works up very quickly is easy to construct and will look beautiful layered over jeans leggings or your favourite lounge wear you can crochet 16 different sizes from baby to 5xl **special package discounts when buying multiple patterns ** spend $10 and get 10% off with code lake10 spend $20 and get 20% off with code lake20 spend $30 and get 30% off with code lake30 spend $40 and get 40% off with code lake40 please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on www lakesideloops com in the future in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes **written pattern** in english us terms **pictures** **video tutorial** **left hand pattern** available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
